key_risks: Environmental and safety concerns, including violations and penalties
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to dependence on raw material suppliers
Regulatory and legal challenges, including compliance risks and disputes
High market competition in the specialty materials industry
controversies: Environmental violations, including a 2023 penalty in Colorado
Legal dispute with Westlake Vinyls, Inc. over arbitration awards and costs
environmental_issues: Air pollution and workplace safety violations
Scrutiny over environmental footprint despite sustainability initiatives
social_issues: Mixed employee sentiments, with reports of a demanding work environment and misalignment of corporate values
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance risks related to evolving global standards on chemicals and plastics
